children.description: Triggered when the mouse is leaves an element.> The Canvas drawing surface does not currently fire events.

children.name: mouseenter
Example - subscribe to the "mouseenter" event during initialization

children.description: Triggered when the mouse is moved over an element.> The Canvas drawing surface does not currently fire events.

children.name: click

children.description: Triggered when an element has been clicked.> The Canvas drawing surface does not currently fire events.

children.name: resize

parameters.name: force `Boolean` *optional*
parameters.description: Whether to proceed with resizing even if the container dimensions have not changed.

children.description: Resizes the surface to match the size of the container.

children.name: eventTarget

parameters.name: e `Object`
parameters.description: The original DOM or jQuery event object.

children.description: Returns the target drawing element of a DOM event.

children.name: draw
children.description: Draws the element and its children on the surface.Existing elements will remain visible.

children.name: width
children.description: The width of the surface element.By default the surface will expand to fill the width of the first positioned container.

children.name: height
children.description: The height of the surface element.By default the surface will expand to fill the height of the first positioned container.

children.name: type
children.description: The preferred type of surface to [create](#create).Supported types (case insensitive):- `svg`- `canvas`- `vml`This option will be ignored if not supported by the browser.See [Supported Browsers](supported-browsers)
